tags.author: Thomas Nabet <thomas.nabet@gmail.com>
tags.todo: Implement Cache for session requests' results?

getSalt.name: getSalt
getSalt.summary: Returns the salt string kept in session.

checkSalt.name: checkSalt
checkSalt.summary: Confronts the given string with the salt string kept in session.

setData.name: setData
setData.summary: Stores or deletes data in the object for the current authenticated user.

arguments.name: index
arguments.description: The name of the index to set, or an associative array of key/values

arguments.name: data
arguments.description: The data to store; if null the given index will be unset

getClassCfg.name: getClassCfg
getClassCfg.summary: Returns the current configuration of this very class.

getTables.name: getTables
getTables.summary: Returns the list of tables used by the current class.

getFields.name: getFields
getFields.summary: Returns the list of fields of the given table, and if empty for each table.

updateInfo.name: updateInfo
updateInfo.summary: Changes the data in the user's table.

getPassword.name: getPassword
getPassword.summary: Encrypts the given string to match the password.

isJustLogin.name: isJustLogin
isJustLogin.summary: Returns true after the log in moment.

setSession.name: setSession
setSession.summary: Sets the given attribute(s) in the user's session.

unsetSession.name: unsetSession
unsetSession.summary: Unsets the given attribute(s) in the user's session if exists.

getSession.name: getSession
getSession.summary: Returns session property from the session's user array (userIndex).

getOsession.name: getOsession
getOsession.summary: Gets an attribute or the whole the "session" part of the session  (sessIndex).

arguments.name: attr
arguments.description: Name of the attribute to get.

setOsession.name: setOsession
setOsession.summary: Sets an attribute the "session" part of the session (sessIndex).

hasSession.name: hasSession
hasSession.summary: Checks if the given attribute exists in the user's session.

updateActivity.name: updateActivity
updateActivity.summary: Updates last activity value for the session in database.

saveSession.name: saveSession
saveSession.summary: Saves the session config in the database.

closeSession.name: closeSession
closeSession.summary: Closes the session in the database.

arguments.name: with_session
arguments.description: session If true deletes also the session information

checkAttempts.name: checkAttempts
checkAttempts.summary: Returns false if the max number of connections attempts has been reached

saveCfg.name: saveCfg
saveCfg.summary: Saves the user's config in the cfg field of the users' table.

setCfg.name: setCfg
setCfg.summary: Saves the attribute(s) values into the session config.

unsetCfg.name: unsetCfg
unsetCfg.summary: Unsets the attribute(s) in the session config.

checkSession.name: checkSession
checkSession.summary: Retrieves user's info from session if needed and checks if authenticated.

isAdmin.name: isAdmin
isAdmin.summary: Checks whether the user is an admin or not.

isDev.name: isDev
isDev.summary: Checks whether the user is an (admin or developer) or not.

setPassword.name: setPassword
setPassword.summary: Change the password in the database after checking the current one.

getName.name: getName
getName.summary: Returns the full name of the given user or the current one.

addToken.name: addToken
addToken.summary: Generates and insert a token in database.

getEmail.name: getEmail
getEmail.summary: Returns the email of the given user or the current one.

test.name: test
test.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: test
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

check.name: check
check.summary: Checks if an error has been thrown or not.

parent.name: check
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

getError.name: getError
getError.summary: Returns the first error in an array with the code and description.

log.name: log

parent.name: log

__call.name: __call

parent.name: __call

getData.name: getData
getData.summary: Retrieves data stored in the data property of the user, only if authenticated.

getPath.name: getPath
getPath.summary: Returns the directory path for the user.

getTmpDir.name: getTmpDir
getTmpDir.summary: Returns the tmp directory path for the user.

isAuth.name: isAuth
isAuth.summary: Returns true if authenticated false otherwise.

getId.name: getId
getId.summary: Returns the user's ID if there is no error.

getGroup.name: getGroup
getGroup.summary: Returns the user's group's ID if there is no error.

expireHotlink.name: expireHotlink
expireHotlink.summary: Expires an hotlink by setting the expire column to now.

getIdFromMagicString.name: getIdFromMagicString
getIdFromMagicString.summary: Retrieves a user's ID from the hotlink's magic string.

logout.name: logout
logout.summary: Unauthenticates, resets the config and destroys the session.

getMailer.name: getMailer
getMailer.summary: Returns an instance of the mailer class.

forcePassword.name: forcePassword
forcePassword.summary: Changes the password in the database.

addToTmp.name: addToTmp
addToTmp.summary: Adds a file to the tmp folder of the user and returns its path.

crypt.name: crypt

decrypt.name: decrypt

makeFingerprint.name: makeFingerprint
makeFingerprint.summary: Generates a random long string (16-32 chars) used as unique fingerprint.

makeMagicString.name: makeMagicString
makeMagicString.summary: Returns an array with a key and a magic string used for making hotlinks.

isMagicString.name: isMagicString
isMagicString.summary: Checks if a given string corresponds to the given hash.

saveNewPermissionTokens.name: saveNewPermissionTokens

getPermissionTokensFromAccountName.name: getPermissionTokensFromAccountName

updatePermissionTokens.name: updatePermissionTokens

hasSkipVerification.name: hasSkipVerification
